listData.name: Purchasing Investment Property
listData.description: Make it happen today, with our Basics Low Rate Investment Loan Offer. The discount of 3.09% is available for the life of the loan. This offer is for new customers to the Bank and for customers of the Bank purchasing a new investment property.

features.additionalInfo:
• The Basics Low-Rate Investment Loan Offer of 6.20% represents a discount of 2.84% off our Basics Investment Loan standard variable rate of 9.04%. 
• The discount of 2.84% is available for the life of the loan. 
• Maximum amount is 60% of the value of the property, with Lender's Mortgage Insurance.
• Low ongoing variable interest rate.
• Principal & Interest
• Weekly, fortnightly or monthly repayments.
• Automatic repayment.
• Ability to make extra repayments.
• Redraw facility.
Principal & Interest

eligibility.additionalInfo: This offer is for new customers to the Bank and for customers of the Bank purchasing a new property. You may avail of this offer if you have approached the Bank directly, not through a referrer (paid or otherwise). This offer can be withdrawn at any time at the Bank's discretion.

fees.name: Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the security property by releasing its security over some or all of the security property and taking security over different property, without any other amendments to the agreement. It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Progress Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the Customer requests a progress payment. It does not include any fee payable for inspections by a quantity surveyor.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable whenever the Customer (or a Guarantor) requests a copy of a document (other than a statement) connected to the Facility.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff to search for the document.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a direct debit to the Customer’s loan account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Tenanted Security Report Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable when the security property is to be the place of residence of the Customer and the Bank ascertains by inspection (because the Customer did not tell the Bank) that the Customer no longer occupies the security property.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff or agents to inspect the security property.

fees.name: Deed Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer whenever the Bank is required to produce a document to a government registry.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document

fees.name: Additional Security Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the Customer asks the Bank to consent to a security interest over the security property or any other property subject to the security.  It is payable whether or not the Bank consents to the security interest

fees.name: Discharge of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Bank agrees to discharge a security.  The Bank may use some or all of this fee to pay its external costs.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a release of the security

fees.name: Title Change Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the title to any security property (for example as a result of a court order or by operation of law). It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Rollover Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer at the end of a fixed rate period if the Customer chooses to rollover to another fixed interest rate for another fixed rate period rather than automatically converting to variable interest rate.

lendingRates.additionalValue: Discount Rate 6.20% represents a discount of 2.84% off our Basics Investment Loan standard variable rate of 9.04%. This offer can be withdrawn at any time at the Bank's discretion. Rates are subject to change without notice. Rates published here apply to a loan up to 60% LVR. For loans with higher LVRs, contact one of our Relationship Managers for a rate.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: The comparison rate is calculated on a loan amount of $150,000 over a term of 25 years based on monthly repayments. Different amounts and terms will result in different Comparison Rates.

listData.description: Part of a range of products designed to assist you if you are looking to buy or start your own business or if you are looking to expand your existing business.

features.additionalInfo:

•	Flexible repayment structures including principal and interest or interest only.

•	Monitor and transact upon your account, including making repayments using abal.online.
•	Merchant facilities so your business can accept EFTPOS, Visa, MasterCard, American Express and Diners Club.
Flexible repayment structures including principal and interest or interest only

listData.name: Personal Loan
listData.description: A Personal Loan designed for customers to enjoy something they want or need now, if they currently don't have the savings or cash to make the purchase.

features.additionalInfo:
•	Fixed and variable interest rates available. Fixed rates offer the security of always knowing how much your repayments will be in advance, which makes it easy to manage your finances.
•	Loans available for a range of amounts and terms.
•	Flexible repayment options - weekly, fortnightly, or monthly.
•	Easy repayment methods including via internet banking, and direct debit from your Arab Bank Australia account.
•	Secured and unsecured options. Security can be a car, boat or a guarantee.
•	Ability to make extra repayments on a variable rate personal loan without any penalties.
•	Regular statements available.
Secured and unsecured options

eligibility.additionalInfo:
The following is subject to the Bank’s lending criteria:
• New and existing customers.
• Individuals who are 18 years of age or over. 
• Available only for private or domestic use and cannot be used for business purposes. 
• Successful completion of applicable Arab Bank Australia Limited (ABAL) identification check requirements.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The displayed variable rate of 19.85% p.a. applies to unsecured personal loans.

The displayed fixed rate of 14% p.a. applies to unsecured personal loans. The Comparison Rate is based on a loan amount of $30,000 and is calculated over a term of 5 years based on monthly repayments. Different amounts and terms will result in different Comparison Rates.

listData.name: The Basics Investment Loan
listData.description: This is our most simple and lowest variable rate investment loan, designed to make borrowing money for your investment property as affordable as possible. If you need all the basics, then take a close look at The Basics Investment Loan.

features.additionalInfo:
• Minimum amount $50,000.
• Maximum amount is 95% of the value of the property.
• Loan Mortgage Insurance (LMI) is required if amount borrowed is more than 80% of the value of the property.
• Variable interest rate.
• Weekly, fortnightly or monthly repayments.
• Automatic repayment.
• Ability to make extra repayments.
• Redraw facility available.
Principal & Interest

eligibility.additionalInfo:
• This loan is available to new and existing customers. 
• Available to applicants over the age of 18 years. 
• Applicant must meet the Bank’s Credit criteria. 
• Loan Mortgage Insurance (LMI) is required if amount borrowed is more than 80% of the value of the property. 
• Successful completion of applicable Arab Bank Australia Limited (ABAL) identification check requirements.

features.additionalInfo: Up to 60% LVR, without Lender's Mortgage Insurance.
Principal & Interest.

The Essentials Low Rate Home Loan Offer of 5.85% represents a discount of 3.29% off our Essentials Home Loan standard variable rate. of 9.14%.
The discount of 3.29% is available for the life of the loan.

eligibility.additionalInfo: This offer is for new customers to the Bank and for customers of the Bank purchasing a new owner occupier property. You may avail of this offer if you have approached the Bank directly, not through a referrer (paid or otherwise). This offer can be withdrawn at any time at the Bank's discretion. Rates are subject to change without notice.

fees.name: Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the security property by releasing its security over some or all of the security property and taking security over different property, without any other amendments to the agreement. It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Progress Payment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the Customer requests a progress payment. It does not include any fee payable for inspections by a quantity surveyor.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable whenever the Customer (or a Guarantor) requests a copy of a document (other than a statement) connected to the Facility.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff to search for the document.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a direct debit to the Customer’s loan account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Tenanted Security Report Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable when the security property is to be the place of residence of the Customer and the Bank ascertains by inspection (because the Customer did not tell the Bank) that the Customer no longer occupies the security property.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff or agents to inspect the security property.

fees.name: Deed Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer whenever the Bank is required to produce a document to a government registry.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document

fees.name: Additional Security Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the Customer asks the Bank to consent to a security interest over the security property or any other property subject to the security.  It is payable whether or not the Bank consents to the security interest

fees.name: Discharge of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Bank agrees to discharge a security.  The Bank may use some or all of this fee to pay its external costs.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a release of the security

fees.name: Title Change Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the title to any security property (for example as a result of a court order or by operation of law). It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Rollover Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer at the end of a fixed rate period if the Customer chooses to rollover to another fixed interest rate for another fixed rate period rather than automatically converting to variable interest rate.

lendingRates.additionalValue:
Discount Rate 5.85% represents a discount of 3.29% off our Essentials Home Loan standard variable rate of 9.14%. This offer can be withdrawn at any time at the Bank's discretion. Rates are subject to change without notice. 
Rates published here apply to a loan up to 60% LVR. For loans with higher LVRs, contact one of our Relationship Managers for a rate.
lendingRates.additionalInfo: The comparison rate is calculated on a loan amount of $150,000 over a term of 25 years based on monthly repayments. Different amounts and terms will result in different Comparison Rates.

listData.name: Fixed Term Deposit: Business
listData.description: Competitive short term, and long term investments.

features.additionalInfo: Different terms available;  between one month and five years.
Competitive interest rates offered.
Interest paid on maturity for up to 1 year terms.  For terms 2, 3, 4, and 5 years interest is paid yearly.
Australian Government Guaranteed for deposits up to $250K.
Term Deposit certificate issued to keep track of your investment.
Minimum Opening Deposit A$1.  For deposits of $500K and over ask for TD rate.
Internet Banking (view only) access via abal.online
Deposits can be made in Australian Dollars and other selected currencies.
Automatic rollover available.
Choice of interest payments credited to a nominated transaction account, collected by cash from your branch or compounded to your term deposit.

eligibility.additionalInfo:
•	Available business customers.
•	Minimum opening balance $1.
•	Successful completion of applicable Arab Bank Australia Limited (ABAL) identification 
check requirements.

listData.name: Fixed Rate Home Loan (Owner Occupier)
listData.description: Our Fixed Rate Home Loan protects you from ongoing interest rate rises, while giving you the added security of consistent repayments during the first phase of your loan.

features.additionalInfo:
• Fixed interest rate for the first 1 to 5 years.
• Weekly, fortnightly or monthly repayments.
• Automatic repayments.
• Loan portability available.
• Maximum LVR for the advertised rates is 60%. For loans with LVRs up to 95%, contact one of our Relationship Managers for a rate.
• Loan Mortgage Insurance (LMI) is required if amount borrowed is more than 80% of the value of the property.

eligibility.additionalInfo:
• This loan is available to new and existing customers.
• Available to applicants over the age of 18 years.
• Applicant must meet the Bank’s Credit criteria.
• Loan Mortgage Insurance (LMI) is required if amount borrowed is more than 80% of the value of the property.
• Successful completion of applicable Arab Bank Australia Limited (ABAL) identification check requirements.

lendingRates.additionalInfo:
Maximum LVR for the advertised rates is 60%. For loans with LVRs up to 95%, contact one of our Relationship Managers for a rate. Upon expiry of your fixed term, your rate will revert to our variable Basics Home Loan interest rate, less a margin of 1.50% for Owner Occupier loans.
The comparison rate is calculated on a loan amount of $150,000 over a term of 25 years based on monthly repayments. Different amounts and terms will result in different Comparison Rates.

listData.name: Commercial Loans - Revolving Line of Credit
listData.description: A product designed for businesses in need of a loan to expand or develop their existing business.

features.additionalInfo: • Ability to access to the funds through EFTPOS, ATM, or aba.online • Interest only repayments • No set repayment schedule • Ability to deposit salary or any other income directly into the facility (every dollar deposited into the facility immediately reduces interest repayments due) • Ability to access funds paid into the facility at any time (up to an agreed limit) • Ability to access funds online via internet banking application • competitive rates of interest.

eligibility.additionalInfo: • Individuals with existing equity in a residential home or investment property. • Minimum loan amount: $20,000 • Maximum loan amount: up to $500,000 • Successful completion of applicable Arab Bank Australia Limited (ABAL) identification check requirements. • The security for this product should be a residential property. Maximum loan to value ratio is 80% of the property value.

listData.name: Bridging Loan
listData.description: It's not easy moving between homes or waiting for construction on your new home to finish. Our Bridging Loan may be the solution to help you transition from one home to another.

features.additionalInfo:
•	Switching into this loan from another product is permitted.
•	Flexible Repayments based upon Interest Only for six months.
•	Option to capitalize the interest over the loan period.
•	Option to establish an automatic repayment schedule linked to an existing Arab Bank Australia transaction account.
•	Ability to monitor the loan account, including making loan repayments, via internet banking at abal.online.
•	No monthly account keeping fees or ongoing annual fees.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All applications for loans are subject to Arab Bank Australia Limited's normal credit approval criteria. Lender's Mortgage Insurance is required on loans above 80% of the property value that is offered as security.

fees.name: Application Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Standard minimum is 0.35% of the approved borrowed amount. Fee rate varies depending on borrower's application.

fees.name: Transfer Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the security property by releasing its security over some or all of the security property and taking security over different property, without any other amendments to the agreement. It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Search Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable whenever the Customer (or a Guarantor) requests a copy of a document (other than a statement) connected to the Facility.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff to search for the document.

fees.name: Direct Debit Dishonour Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever a direct debit to the Customer’s loan account is dishonoured.

fees.name: Tenanted Security Report Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Per hour or part thereof - payable when the security property is to be the place of residence of the Customer and the Bank ascertains by inspection (because the Customer did not tell the Bank) that the Customer no longer occupies the security property.  It is calculated on the basis of the time that it takes the Bank’s staff or agents to inspect the security property.

fees.name: Deed Production Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer whenever the Bank is required to produce a document to a government registry.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document

fees.name: Additional Security Consent Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable whenever the Customer asks the Bank to consent to a security interest over the security property or any other property subject to the security.  It is payable whether or not the Bank consents to the security interest

fees.name: Discharge of Security Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Bank agrees to discharge a security.  The Bank may use some or all of this fee to pay its external costs.  It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a release of the security

fees.name: Title Change Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable if the Customer asks the Bank to change the title to any security property (for example as a result of a court order or by operation of law). It does not include any solicitor costs or fees payable to a government registry to register a document.

fees.name: Rollover Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by the Customer at the end of a fixed rate period if the Customer chooses to rollover to another fixed interest rate for another fixed rate period rather than automatically converting to variable interest rate.
